e500: Internal Server Error, please try again later

error.topText: Uh oh... The server ran into an error while processing your request.

mfa.inputCode: Input One Time Password from your Authenticator:
mfa.serverdown: Unknown error, this shouldn't happen. Is the server down?
mfa.enableIntro: Enable 2-Factor Authentication? Click next to proceed.
mfa.enableHow: Scan this QR code with your Authenticator app, then input the code below.
mfa.youdidit: You did it! 2-Factor Authentication is now enabled!
